name: Nani's Memories
description:
Help Nani to solve the puzzle of where her children are located throughout the world. The challenge is tricky, but Nani has promised cookies as a thank you for helping her! Win or lose, you're taking home some cookies! Objects will highlight if you can interact with them (5 in total). Click on the different objects around her home to receive pieces of memory from Nani that will help you crack the code1

This game was developed for the Global Startup Cities GameJam https://itch.io/jam/globalstartupcitiesgamejam

Team Name: Not Yet

Credits:

Dyston Madsen- Programming, Art

Marcos Alebuena- Story/Narrative Design (porfolio)

Zhakknn- Music (https://zhakh.itch.io)
